vendor_name: Monterey Beach Hotel, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel (Formerly Monterey Tides)
title: Coastal California Beachside Monterey Retreat with Waterfront Restaurant
description: Savour the soothing scent of the sea while gazing out over stunning views of Monterey and the Pacific Ocean at the beachfront Monterey Tides hotel. Embrace Californian surf culture and soak up some rays at the hotel's private beach or enjoy fine dining and ocean views at Tides Waterfront Kitchen. In the evening, take a dip in the heated outdoor pool or soak in the blissful hot tub before retiring to your comfortable room to be lulled to sleep by the sound of crashing waves.
offer_address: 2600 Sand Dunes Dr, Monterey, CA 93940 United States

title: Coastal California Escape Overlooking Monterey Bay with Hot Tub, Day Spa & Waterfront Dining
description: Breathe in the Californian sea breeze with a cosy coastal stay at InterContinental The Clement Monterey, an IHG Hotel. Set along the historic Cannery Row and overlooking the breathtaking Monterey Bay, you'll be all set to savour fresh, locally sourced seafood at waterfront C Restaurant + Bar, and sip handcrafted cocktails alfresco style at C Patio. For an extra slice of head-to-toe rejuvenation, head to the hotel's tranquil day spa, heated pool or hot tub.
location_description: InterContinental The Clement Monterey, an IHG Hotel
